languages.text: "Нет, лучше убей, учитель, но не превращай в эту безмозглую тварь!"

traits.locale_text: "Клянусь, я не мыслил ничего богохульного! Это же просто бумажка с объявлением, какой вред она несет изваянию Всевышнего?"

languages.text: "No! Please, Teacher, anything but that! Better to kill me than turn me into one of those mindless things!"
languages.original_text: "Нет, лучше убей, учитель, но не превращай в эту безмозглую тварь!"

traits.locale_text: "No! Better kill me, teacher, than turn me into one of those brainless things!"
"No! Better kill me, teacher, than turn me into one of those brainless things!"
"No! Better to kill me, teacher, than turn me into one of those mindless things!"
"No! Better to kill me, teacher, than turn me into one of those mindless things!"
"No! Please, Teacher, anything but that! Better to kill me than turn me into one of those mindless things!"
"No! Please, Teacher, anything but that! Better to kill me than turn me into one of those mindless things!"

languages.text: «¡No! ¡Por favor, profesor, todo menos eso! ¡Prefiero que me mate a convertirme en una de esas cosas sin mente!».
languages.original_text: "No! Please, Teacher, anything but that! Better to kill me than turn me into one of those mindless things!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No! ¡Por favor, profesor, todo menos eso! ¡Prefiero que me mate a convertirme en una de esas cosas sin mente!».

languages.text: 「嫌だ！お願いします、先生、それだけは！魂のないモノになってしまうより、死んだ方がいい！」
languages.original_text: "No! Please, Teacher, anything but that! Better to kill me than turn me into one of those mindless things!"

traits.locale_text: 「嫌だ！お願いします、先生、それだけは！魂のないモノになってしまうより、死んだ方がいい！」

languages.text: “不要！求你了，导师！别这样！哪怕是杀了我也好，别把我改造成那种没脑子的东西！”
languages.original_text: "No! Please, Teacher, anything but that! Better to kill me than turn me into one of those mindless things!"

traits.locale_text: “不要！求你了，导师！别这样！哪怕是杀了我也好，别把我改造成那种没脑子的东西！”

languages.text: "Nein! Bitte, Lehrer, alles, nur das nicht! Tötet mich lieber, als mich in so ein hirnloses Ding zu verwandeln!"
languages.original_text: "No! Please, Teacher, anything but that! Better to kill me than turn me into one of those mindless things!"

traits.locale_text: "Nein! Bitte, Lehrer, alles, nur das nicht! Tötet mich lieber, als mich in so ein hirnloses Ding zu verwandeln!"

languages.text: « Non ! Pitié, maître, tout sauf ça ! Je préfère mourir plutôt que de devenir l'une de ces créatures sans cervelle ! »
languages.original_text: "No! Please, Teacher, anything but that! Better to kill me than turn me into one of those mindless things!"

traits.locale_text: « Non ! Pitié, maître, tout sauf ça ! Je préfère mourir plutôt que de devenir l'une de ces créatures sans cervelle ! »

languages.text: "Hayır! Lütfen öğretmenim, başka her şeye razıyım! Beni o akılsız şeylere döndüreceğine öldür daha iyi!"
languages.original_text: "No! Please, Teacher, anything but that! Better to kill me than turn me into one of those mindless things!"
